title: Bug 33813List doesn't send out selection events for arrow keys
OB: Bug 33813List doesn't send out selection events for arrow keys I20030304 Open WindowPreferencesWorkbenchFonts Select first item in List with mouse use Arrow Down to select other entriesObserve: the description field isn't updated. If you use the mouse to select the field, thedescription field is updated.
SR: I20030304 Open WindowPreferencesWorkbenchFonts Select first item in List with mouse use Arrow Down to select other entriesObserve: the description field isn't updated. If you use the mouse to select the field, thedescription field is updated.
